sqlMap.select:
/*readReportChildrenList*/ SELECT r.`id`, r.`report_date`, r.`report_state`, r.`type`, r.`management_state`, r.`report_no`, `crew_fatalities`, `crew_minor_injuries`, `crew_serious_injuries`, `cabin_fatalities`, `cabin_minor_injuries`, `cabin_serious_injuries`, `passenger_fatalities`, `passenger_minor_injuries`, `passenger_serious_injuries`, `aircraft_damage`, `injury`, `delay_time`, `report_parent_id` FROM report r inner join report_parent rp on r.report_parent_id = rp.id WHERE rp.report_no = #report_no#
and r.`management_state` in (#management_state#)

/*readReportWorstSituation*/ SELECT r.`id`, `report_date`, `report_state`, `type`, `management_state`, `report_no`, `crew_fatalities`, `crew_minor_injuries`, `crew_serious_injuries`, `cabin_fatalities`, `cabin_minor_injuries`, `cabin_serious_injuries`, `passenger_fatalities`, `passenger_minor_injuries`, `passenger_serious_injuries`, sia.name as `aircraft_damage`, sii.name as `injury`, sid.name as `delay_time`, `report_parent_id` FROM report r INNER JOIN select_items sia ON r.aircraft_damage = sia.value INNER JOIN select_items sii ON r.injury = sii.value INNER JOIN select_items sid ON r.delay_time = sid.value where sia.category = 'aircraft_damage' and sii.category = 'injury' and sid.category = 'delay_time' and report_parent_id = #report_parent_id# ORDER BY $order_column$ desc limit 0, 1

/*readReportHighestPriority*/ SELECT ri.`id`, r.`id`, rp.`id`, r.`report_no`, ri.`type`, `title`, `time`, `time_type`, `narrative`, `recommendation`, `comments`, `status`, `status_review`, `status_determine`, `status_hazard_id`, si.name as `priority`, `report_id` FROM report_item ri INNER JOIN report r on ri.report_id = r.id INNER JOIN report_parent rp on r.report_parent_id = rp.id INNER JOIN select_items si on ri.priority = si.value WHERE 1=1 and rp.`id` = #report_parent_id# and ri.`status_review`= 'SUBMITTED' and ri.`status_determine` = 'Accepted' and ri.`type` != 'BASIC' and si.`category` = 'priority' order by si.value desc limit 0, 1
